temp.fibHeap.stixar.graph.conn
Class StrongComponents

java.lang.Object
  temp.fibHeap.stixar.graph.conn.StrongComponents

public class StrongComponents
extends java.lang.Object

Strongly Connected Components.

Two vertices u,v in a directed graph are said to be in the same strongly connected component if there is both a path from u to v and a path from v to u.

This class provides methods for computing the set of largest strongly connected components for a given digraph. The provided results may take the following forms.

  1. A component map mapping every node to an integer identifying a component.
  2. A leader map mapping every node to a unique representative node for its component.
  3. A quotient graph may be constructed, in which each component has one vertex and there is an edge between vertices exactly when there is an edge between nodes in the respective components in the original graph.

This implementation works by way of a single depth first search in which the outgoing edges for each vertex are enumerated twice. The algorithm is attributed to Tarjan and runs in linear time.

QuotientCompListMapKey

public static final java.lang.Object QuotientCompListMapKey
If quotient graph is generated, it is given an attribute map in which each node is associated with a list of nodes in the original graph. This attribute map can be retrieved by using this key.

Method Detail

quotient

public static BasicDigraph quotient(Digraph dg)
Compute the quotient graph for an arbitrary digraph.

The resulting quotient graph has a node attribute associated with it, available via QuotientCompListMapKey, which attributes a CList<Node> of nodes from dg with every node in the quotient graph.

Parameters:
dg - the digraph whose quotient is to be computed.
Returns:
an attributed quotient graph.

quotient

public static BasicDigraph quotient(Digraph dg,
                                    NodeMap<Node> qMap)
Compute the quotient graph for an arbitrary digraph.

The resulting quotient graph has a node attribute associated with it, available via QuotientCompListMapKey, which attributes a CList<Node> of nodes from dg with every node in the quotient graph.

In addition, qMap is built which attributes every node in dg with a node in the resulting quotient graph.

Parameters:
dg - the digraph whose quotient is to be computed.
qMap - a node attribute map associating nodes in the quotient graph with nodes in dg.
Returns:
an attributed quotient graph.

leaders

public static NodeMap<Node> leaders(Digraph dg)
Compute a leader node for every component.

Parameters:
dg - the digraph whose strong components are found and for each component, a leader node is selected.
Returns:
a NodeMap associating for every node in dg a leader node representing a single strongly connected component in dg.

components

public static int[] components(Digraph dg)
Compute a component number for every node.

Parameters:
dg - the digraph whose strong components are found and for each component, a unique integer is assigned.
Returns:
a node attribute array containing the integer id of the component for each node.

leaders

protected final NodeMap<Node> leaders()
Return a node attribute array attributing to each node a leader node. There is exactly 1 leader node per component in the digraph.

Returns:
A node attribute array attributing to each node a leader node.

components

Return a node attribute array identifying the component of each node in the digraph.

Returns:
a node attribute array identifying the component of each node in the digraph.

quotient

protected final BasicDigraph quotient()
Return the quotient graph in which each component c is linked to another c' if there is an edge from some node in c to some node in c'.

The returned graph has a node map associated with it which maps every node in the quotient graph to a CList<Node> containing all the nodes in the original graph belonging to the same component. The key for this map is QuotientCompListMapKey.

quotient

protected final BasicDigraph quotient(NodeMap<Node> qMap)
Return the quotient graph in which each component c is linked to another c' if there is an edge from some node in c to some node in c'.

The returned graph has a node map associated with it which maps every node in the quotient graph to a CList<Node> containing all the nodes in the original graph belonging to the same component. The key for this map is QuotientCompListMapKey.

run

protected void run()
